name: Agent VS Sniper
description:
This is a small project that was inspired by the game "God Save The Queen"

The snipers job is to figure out who the agent is. If the sniper kills too many civilians or just can't do the job in time the sniper loses. The sniper has a radar which will turn yellow if the crosshair is close to the agent. If it's red it is far from the agent.

The agents job is to stay alive for 2 minutes. The agent will have to blend in in order to not look sussy.

The game is played by 2 people with the same PC.
